full_output.summary: Motivated backend developer with 2 years of experience, currently working at Rozana, an e- commerce product-based company, Procient in Laravel, Javascript, jQuery and experienced in Java, Spring, Spring Boot and Angular. Seeking to leverage my expertise in Java, Spring, Spring Boot and Angular development to contribute to dynamic team.

education.school: Shri Guru Ram Rai Public School

projects.name: planetlearning.org
projects.description: Developed planetlearning.org, a full stack web application using Spring Boot and Angular. Implemented robust authentication and authorization using Spring Security, ensuring privacy and secure access for all users. Designed and managed a scalable database using Hibernate and JPA. Created responsive and dynamic user interfaces with angular, leading to increased user engagement and interaction.

projects.name: Bookstore Ecommerce Project
projects.description: Built an e-commerce platform using Java, Servlet, JSP, and Hibernate. Features include book search, add to cart, user management, order history, and rating system. Implemented admin functionalities for managing users, categories, reviews, and orders.

experiences.description: Collabarated with a team of 20 to 25 members to develop and mantain high trafc web application using laravel, javascript, jquery and other technologies, signicantly enhancing performance. Played a key role in enhancing Rozana's e-commerce platform, improving load times and user retention. Integrated 2+ third-party APIs, expanding the platform's functionality.
